description.en:
Sound from the source
We are building a music-technology platform for the blockchain era with artists, creativity and collaboration at the very centre; connecting all participants in the music ecosystem to drive transformational change for the industry. Artists will be able to collaborate over smart-contracts and monetise more of their creativity.

Emanate ‘Smart-collaborations’ allow artists to work together in an instant and trustless
workflow. The MN8 Audio Exchange Protocol (AEP) will be home for the world’s music before
it is integrated into any other channel or device.
